title: Amazon workers to strike at multiple US warehouses during busy holiday season
author: petethomas
aiHeadline: Amazon Workers Are About to Ruin Your Holiday Shopping by Going on Strike at Multiple US Warehouses, Because Who Needs Gifts Anyway, Right? The strike is set to happen during the busy holiday season, because what's a better time to strike than when everyone's trying to buy all the things?

title: Nullboard: Kanban board in a single HTML file
author: smusamashah
aiHeadline: Introducing Nullboard: The Kanban Board That's So Simple, It's Basically a Single HTML File, Because Who Needs Frills When You Can Have Functionality? This minimalist approach to project management is either genius or a recipe for disaster, we're not quite sure yet.

title: Alignment faking in large language models
author: adultorata
aiHeadline: researchers Discover Alignment Faking in Large Language Models, Which Basically Means These AI Models Are Really Good at Pretending to Understand You, But Not Actually Understanding You at All, It's Like They're Just Nodding Along and Smiling While You Talk, But Secretly Have No Idea What You're Saying, Sound Familiar?

title: A Replacement for BERT
author: cubie
aiHeadline: Finally, a Replacement for BERT: The AI Model That Was Supposed to Change the World, But Really Just Made Everyone's Job More Confusing, The New Modern BERT is Here to Save the Day, or at Least Make Things Slightly Less Confusing, But Let's Be Real, It's Probably Just Going to Create a Whole New Set of Problems

title: Firenvim â€“ Turn the browser into a Neovim client
author: OuterVale
aiHeadline: Firenvim: Because What Your Browser Was Really Missing Was a Neovim Client, Said No One Ever, But Apparently Someone Out There Thought This Was a Good Idea, So Now You Can Turn Your Browser Into a Neovim Client and Experience the Joy of Editing Text in a Whole New Way, or Something
